title: List of all Androidtextview   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidtextview   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: RotatingText
repoList.description: A periodic text updating library

repoList.name: emojicon
repoList.description: A library to show emoji in TextView, EditText (like WhatsApp) for Android

repoList.name: MaterialBadgeTextView
repoList.description: As the name describes, this is an Android library that you can use to show new messages badge and new features badge.

repoList.name: CountAnimationTextView
repoList.description: A tiny Android library makes very easier count animation of TextView.

repoList.name: reflow-animator
repoList.description: A library for easily transitioning between sibling TextViews.

repoList.name: CompoundIconTextView
repoList.description: An android library that is able to set a vector drawable at text view pre-Lollipop.

repoList.name: FlipTimerView
repoList.description: FlipTimerView library for Android

repoList.name: countingtextview
repoList.description: Animated Counting TextView library for Android

repoList.name: TextViewPlus
repoList.description: an android library for setting custom font in xml layout

repoList.description: Android library for typewriter like effects
